subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Lleyton Hewitt beat Gaël Monfils, 7-5, 6-3, on Saturday in the final of the Kooyong Classic, a warm-up for the Australian Open, which begins Monday.
snippet: Lleyton Hewitt beat Gaël Monfils, 7-5, 6-3, on Saturday in the final of the Kooyong Classic, a warm-up for the Australian Open, which begins Monday.
